title: User Registration with Email
description: Verify that a user can register successfully using email with validation and confirmation email received.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input valid email and strong password
Submit the registration form
Check that a confirmation email is sent to the user
Click on the confirmation link in the email
Verify that user account is activated and redirect to login or dashboard page

title: User Registration with Social Login
description: Ensure user can register and login via social login providers successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click on available social login option (e.g. Google, Facebook)
Authenticate via social provider
Verify user is logged in and redirected to dashboard

title: Password Validation and Compromised Detection
description: Verify that password inputs are validated for strength and checked against compromised password database within 2 seconds.

steps.description: Attempt to register or update profile with a weak password
Verify rejection and message indicating password strength requirements
Attempt to use a known compromised password
Verify rejection and alert message within 2 seconds

title: Multi-Factor Authentication Setup and Enforcement
description: Verify that users can enable MFA and are required to provide it on login.

steps.description: Login to user account
Navigate to security settings and enable MFA
Verify MFA setup instructions and success message
Logout and login again
Provide MFA code when prompted
Verify successful login only after correct MFA verification

title: Document Upload with Supported File Types and Validation
description: Validate that users can upload PDF, DOCX, TXT, and audio files with size limits and preview feature.

steps.description: Navigate to document upload interface
Upload document in each supported format under 10MB
Verify upload completes within 30 seconds and preview is displayed
Attempt upload of unsupported file format
Verify upload is rejected with appropriate error message
Attempt upload of file larger than allowed size per plan
Verify upload is rejected with file size error

title: AI Summary Generation Success Flow
description: Verify successful generation of multiple summary types using OpenAI GPT-4 and fallback to Anthropic Claude if needed.

steps.description: Upload a supported document under 50 pages
Select summary type (executive, technical, educational, topics, narrative)
Submit document for processing
Verify summary is generated within 45 seconds
Verify summary quality and format corresponding to the selected style
Simulate failure of primary AI provider
Verify fallback to alternative AI provider occurs automatically
Verify user receives summary without detectable degradation in quality or delay

title: Summary Regeneration and Parameter Adjustment
description: Ensure user can regenerate summaries and adjust parameters after initial result.

steps.description: Upload document and generate initial summary
Use UI to adjust summary parameters (length, style)
Request summary regeneration
Verify new summary reflects updated parameters and is delivered within expected time

title: Export Summary in Multiple Formats
description: Validate exporting summaries in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, Markdown, Notion, Trello, and HTML email formats preserves formatting and metadata within 10 seconds.

steps.description: Generate a valid summary for testing
Export summary sequentially in each supported format
Verify each exported file preserves summary formatting and metadata
Verify export completes within 10 seconds per format

title: Subscription Plan Limits Enforcement
description: Verify usage limits and upload size restrictions are enforced per subscription plan with notifications on limit reached.

steps.description: Login as a user on Free plan
Upload documents and generate summaries until plan limit is exceeded
Verify system restricts further usage and displays limit reached notification
Upgrade to Basic or Professional plan
Verify increased upload size and usage limits are applied

title: Payment Processing and Subscription Upgrade
description: Validate subscription payments via Stripe and successful upgrade of user plan.

steps.description: Login and navigate to subscription management
Select a paid plan and initiate payment
Input valid payment information and submit
Verify payment is processed successfully via Stripe
Verify user subscription plan is updated accordingly

title: API Backend Response Time and Uptime
description: Ensure backend API response time is under 500ms at 95th percentile and system uptime is above 99.5%.

steps.description: Simulate 1000 API requests with typical load
Verify 95th percentile response time is below 500ms
Check system monitoring status page
Verify uptime in reporting period is over 99.5%

title: LGPD Compliance: Consent and Data Deletion
description: Verify explicit user consent is required and user can request data deletion in compliance with LGPD.

steps.description: Register a new user and verify that consent checkbox is required before proceeding
Confirm registration fails if consent is not given
Login as registered user, navigate to privacy settings
Request account/data deletion
Verify confirmation prompt and successful deletion of user data

title: Drag & Drop Document Upload UI Interaction
description: Validate drag and drop functionality for document upload including visual feedback and error handling.

steps.description: Drag supported file over drop zone
Verify visual highlight/feedback on drop zone
Drop the file on drop zone
Verify file upload starts and preview appears
Drag unsupported file over drop zone
Verify rejection with appropriate UI error message

title: Multi-language UI and Notification Verification
description: Ensure the interface and notifications correctly support Portuguese and English languages and can be switched dynamically.

steps.description: Navigate to settings and switch UI language to Portuguese
Verify all UI elements and notifications display in Portuguese
Switch UI language to English
Verify all UI elements and notifications display in English

title: User Profile and Plan Management
description: Verify user can view and edit profile details, view current subscription plan, and access usage history from dashboard.

steps.description: Login and navigate to user dashboard
Verify profile details are displayed correctly
Edit profile information and save changes
Verify changes persist after refresh
Verify current subscription plan and usage statistics are visible

title: Audio Document Transcription Processing
description: Test uploading audio files and successful transcription by AI with accurate text extraction.

steps.description: Upload supported audio file within allowed size
Submit for processing
Verify transcription text output appears accurately within expected time

title: Error Handling: AI Service Downtime
description: Verify system behavior and user feedback when both AI providers are unavailable.

steps.description: Simulate downtime of OpenAI GPT-4 and Anthropic Claude services
Submit document for summary generation
Verify user receives informative error message with retry suggestion

title: Recovery Process: Backup and Data Restoration
description: Verify that backup and recovery policies successfully restore user data after incident.

steps.description: Simulate data loss scenario
Trigger recovery process from backups
Verify user documents, profiles, and subscription data are fully restored
